itemDescription: English rugby union player and coach

wikipedia_page.main: Alistair "Ali" Hepher (born 3 October 1974) is a rugby union player and coach. He played at Fly-half for Northampton. Since retiring from playing he has worked as a coach at Bedford RFC, Northampton and Exeter Chiefs.

link_mentions.page: 2000 England rugby union tour of South Africa
response: Scott Benton (Leeds), Kyran Bracken (Saracens), Ali Hepher (Northampton Saints), Nick Walshe (Saracens), Jonny Wilkinson (Newcastle Falcons), Martyn Wood (Saracens).
* Ali Hepher (born 1974), English rugby union player
